00021 #ifndef _KALMAN_FILTER_H_
00022 #define _KALMAN_FILTER_H_
00023 
00024 //#define ENABLE_DEBUG
00025 //#define ENABLE_TEST
00026 
00027 #include "Debug.nxc"
00028 #include "Matrix.nxc"
00029 #include "RandomNorm.nxc"
00030 
00031 #define KALMAN_GAIN_PRECISION 1000   /* gain precision */
00032 
00043 struct KalmanFilter
00044 {
00045     Matrix X; 
00046     Matrix A; 
00047     Matrix B; 
00048     Matrix H; 
00049     Matrix Q; 
00050     Matrix R; 
00051     Matrix P; 
00052     Matrix K; 
00053     long Ks;  
00054     bool unityModel; 
00055 };
00056 
00065 void KalmanFilterInit(KalmanFilter &filter, Matrix &A, Matrix &B, Matrix &H,
00066                       Matrix &Q, Matrix &R, Matrix &P0, Matrix &X0)
00067 {
00068     filter.unityModel = false;
00069     filter.A = A;
00070     filter.B = B;
00071     filter.H = H;
00072     filter.Q = Q;
00073     filter.R = R;
00074     filter.P = P0;
00075     filter.X = X0;
00076 }
00077 
00089 void KalmanFilterInitUnity(KalmanFilter &filter, Matrix &Q, Matrix &R,
00090                            Matrix &P0, Matrix &X0)
00091 {
00092     filter.unityModel = true;
00093     filter.Q = Q;
00094     filter.R = R;
00095     filter.P = P0;
00096     filter.X = X0;
00097 }
00098 
00102 inline void KalmanFilterGetX(KalmanFilter &filter, Matrix &X)
00103 {
00104     X = filter.X;
00105 }
00106 
00112 inline void KalmanFilterGetP(KalmanFilter &filter, Matrix &P)
00113 {
00114     P = filter.P;
00115 }
00116 
00123 void KalmanFilterStep(KalmanFilter &filter, Matrix &U, Matrix &Z)
00124 {
00125     Matrix BU, Xp, Yr, tmpV;
00126     Matrix Pp, Sr, tmpM;
00127     
00128     if (filter.unityModel)   /* A = B = H = I */
00129     {
00130         /* Predict step Xp = X + U */
00131         Xp = filter.X;
00132         MatrixAdd(Xp, U);
00133 
00134         /* Predict step: Pp = P + Q */
00135         Pp = filter.P;
00136         MatrixAdd(Pp, filter.Q);
00137 
00138         /* Measurement residual: Yr = Z - Xp */
00139         Yr = Z;
00140         MatrixSubtract(Yr, Xp);
00141 
00142         /* Residual covariance: Sr = Pp + R */
00143         Sr = Pp;
00144         MatrixAdd(Sr, filter.R);
00145 
00146         /* (Optimal) K = Pp * Inv(Sr) */
00147         filter.Ks = MatrixInverse(Sr, KALMAN_GAIN_PRECISION,
00148                                   tmpM);        /* Sr = Inv(Sr) */
00149         MatrixMultiply(Pp, tmpM, filter.K);     /* K = Pp * Inv(Sr) */
00150     }
00151     else  /* Complete model */
00152     {
00153         /* Predict step: Xp = A * X + B * U */
00154 
00155         MatrixMultiply(filter.B, U, BU);        /* BU = B * U */
00156         MatrixMultiply(filter.A, filter.X, Xp); /* Xp = A * X */
00157         MatrixAdd(Xp, BU);                      /* Xp = A * X + B * U */
00158 
00159         /* Predict step: Pp = A * P * T(A) + Q */
00160 
00161         MatrixMultiply(filter.A, filter.P, Pp); /* Pp = A * P */
00162         MatrixTranspose(filter.A);              /* A = T(A) */
00163         MatrixMultiply(Pp, filter.A, tmpM);     /* Pp = A * P * T(A) */
00164         Pp = tmpM;
00165         MatrixAdd(Pp, filter.Q);                /* Pp = A * P * T(A) + Q */
00166         MatrixTranspose(filter.A);              /* Restore original A */
00167 
00168         /* Measurement residual: Yr = Z - H * Xp */
00169 
00170         MatrixMultiply(filter.H, Xp, tmpV);    /* tmp = H * Xp */
00171         Yr = Z;
00172         MatrixSubtract(Yr, tmpV);               /* Yr = Z - H * Xp */
00173 
00174         /* Residual covariance: Sr = H * Pp * T(H) + R */
00175         
00176         MatrixMultiply(filter.H, Pp, Sr);       /* Sr = H * Pp */
00177         MatrixTranspose(filter.H);              /* H = T(H) */
00178         MatrixMultiply(Sr, filter.H, tmpM);     /* Sr = H * Pp * T(H) */
00179         Sr = tmpM;
00180         MatrixAdd(Sr, filter.R);                /* Sr = H * Pp * T(H) + R */
00181 
00182         /* (Optimal) K = Pp * T(H) * Ks * Inv(Sr) */
00183         
00184         MatrixMultiply(Pp, filter.H, filter.K); /* K = Pp * H */
00185         filter.Ks = MatrixInverse(Sr, KALMAN_GAIN_PRECISION,
00186                                   tmpM);        /* tmpM = Inv(Sr) */
00187         MatrixMultiply(filter.K, tmpM, Sr);     /* K = Pp * H * Inv(Sr) */
00188         filter.K = Sr;
00189         MatrixTranspose(filter.H);              /* Restore original H */
00190     }
00191 
00192     /* At this point K is automatically scalled by Ks because of
00193      * Inv(Sr) being scaled. This will prevent K from falling
00194      * to 0. If it is 0, it will be set to I.
00195      */
00196     if (MatrixIsNull(filter.K))
00197        MatrixInitIdentity(filter.K, filter.K.rows, filter.K.cols);
00198 
00199     /* Posteriori update: X = Xp + K * Yr / Ks*/
00200 
00201     filter.X = Xp;                      /* X = Xp */
00202     MatrixMultiply(filter.K, Yr, Xp);   /* tmp = K * Yr */
00203     MatrixReduce(Xp, filter.Ks);        /* tmp = K * Yr / Ks */
00204     MatrixAdd(filter.X, Xp);            /* X = Xp + K * Yr / Ks */
00205                                         /* Xp no more useful after this */
00206 
00207     /* Posteriori update: P = (Ks * I - K * H) * Pp / Ks */
00208 
00209     MatrixInitDiagonal(tmpM, filter.K.rows,
00210                        filter.K.cols,
00211                        filter.Ks);          /* tmp = Ks * I */
00212     if (filter.unityModel)
00213     {
00214         MatrixSubtract(tmpM, filter.K);     /* tmp = (Ks * I - K) */
00215     }
00216     else
00217     {
00218         MatrixMultiply(filter.K, filter.H,
00219                        filter.P);           /* P = (K * H) */
00220         MatrixSubtract(tmpM, filter.P);     /* tmp = (Ks * I - K * H) */
00221     }
00222     MatrixMultiply(tmpM, Pp, filter.P);     /* P = (Ks * I - K * H) * Pp / Ks*/
00223     MatrixReduce(filter.P, filter.Ks);      /* P = (Ks * I - K) * Pp / Ks */
00224 }
00225 
00226 /* #define ENABLE_TEST */
00227 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00228 
00229 #define DIM          1
00230 #define SetPoint     1500
00231 #define InitialPoint 0
00232 #define InitialP     0
00233 #define QPoint       200
00234 #define RPoint       500
00235 
00236 int initialX[] = {InitialPoint, InitialPoint, InitialPoint, InitialPoint};
00237 int initialU[] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00238 int lastPoint = 0;
00239 int lastXPos = 0;
00240 
00241 void PlotKalman(Matrix &z, Matrix &x, Matrix &p, int yMin, int yMax, int xPos)
00242 {
00243      int za = ((MatrixGet(z, 0, 0) - yMin) * 63) / (yMax - yMin);
00244      int xa = ((MatrixGet(x, 0, 0) - yMin) * 63) / (yMax - yMin);
00245      int pa = MatrixGet(p, 0, 0);
00246 
00247      if (xa > 63) xa = 63;
00248      if (xa < 0) xa = 0;
00249      if (xPos < lastXPos) lastXPos = 0;
00250 
00251      PointOut(xPos, za, false);
00252      CircleOut(xPos, za, 2, false);
00253      LineOut(lastXPos, lastPoint, xPos, xa, false);
00254 
00255      int deviation = Sqrt(pa);
00256      LineOut(xPos, (xa - deviation), xPos, (xa + deviation), false);
00257      lastPoint = xa;
00258      lastXPos = xPos;
00259 }
00260 
00266 void TestKalmanFilter()
00267 {
00268      Matrix x, u, z;
00269      int xl;
00270      KalmanFilter filter;
00271      Matrix A, B, H, Q, R, P;
00272 
00273      MatrixInitIdentity(A, DIM, DIM);
00274      MatrixInitIdentity(B, DIM, DIM);
00275      MatrixInitIdentity(H, DIM, DIM);
00276      MatrixInitDiagonal(Q, DIM, DIM, QPoint);
00277      MatrixInitDiagonal(R, DIM, DIM, RPoint);
00278      MatrixInitDiagonal(P, DIM, DIM, InitialP);
00279 
00280      MatrixInitElements(x, DIM, 1, initialX);
00281      MatrixInitElements(u, DIM, 1, initialU);
00282      MatrixInit(z, DIM, 1);
00283 
00284      //KalmanFilterInit(filter, A, B, H, Q, R, P, x);
00285      KalmanFilterInitUnity(filter, Q, R, P, x);
00286      xl = InitialPoint;
00287 
00288      while(true)
00289      {
00290          ClearScreen();
00291          int jl = 0;
00292          for (int j = 5; j < 110; j += 5)
00293          {
00294              for (int k = 0; k < DIM; k++)
00295              {
00296                  if (k == 0)
00297                  MatrixSet(z, k, 0, SetPoint + RandomNorm(100));
00298                  else
00299                  MatrixSet(z, k, 0, 0);
00300                  break;
00301              }
00302              int t1 = CurrentTick();
00303              KalmanFilterStep(filter, u, z);
00304              int t2 = CurrentTick();
00305              KalmanFilterGetX(filter, x);
00306              KalmanFilterGetP(filter, P);
00307              PlotKalman(z, x, P, SetPoint - 700, SetPoint + 700, j);
00308 
00309              TextOut(0,  LCD_LINE1, "---------------------", false);
00310              NumOut (0,  LCD_LINE1, MatrixGet(x, 0, 0), false);
00311              NumOut (55, LCD_LINE1, t2 - t1, false);
00312          }
00313      }
00314 }
00315 
00316 /*
00317 task main()
00318 {
00319     TestKalmanFilter();
00320 }
00321 */
00322 #endif
